meanings.sent1: I always make sure to carry johnnies in my wallet for safety.
meanings.sent2: The store sells johnnies in discreet packaging.
meanings.sent3: Before going out, Sarah jokingly asked if anyone had extra johnnies.
meanings.sent4: Using johnnies is like wearing a shield against risks.
meanings.sent5: Remember, johnnies are your best friends in intimate moments.

meanings.definition: A nickname for someone named John.
meanings.sent1: Hey, Johnnies, do you want to grab lunch together?
meanings.sent2: Johnnies is known for his sense of humor among friends.
meanings.sent3: At the party, everyone cheered for Johnnies when he arrived.
meanings.sent4: Johnnies is the captain of our soccer team, leading us to victory.
meanings.sent5: When in doubt, ask Johnnies for advice; he always knows what to do.
